displayName: Ensure 'EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE' Is Revoked from 'DBSNMP'
rationale: Migrated `DBSNMP` users have more privileges than required.
recommended_action:
To remediate this setting, execute the following SQL statement, keeping in mind if this is granted in both container and pluggable database, you must connect to both places to revoke.
```
REVOKE EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE FROM DBSNMP;
```
error_message: 'EXECUTE ANY PRODECURE' was found on one or more 'DBSNMP' users
ruleNames: Ensure 'EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE' Is Revoked from 'DBSNMP'
